main event: A bright, flashing light was seen moving eastward at a low altitude before hovering and then disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object appeared to be oval or circular in shape and emitted a very bright white light.
The size of the object was estimated to be approximately 20 to 30 feet in diameter.
The sighting lasted for approximately 2 to 3 minutes.
The night was clear with no cloud cover, and no other aircraft or objects were observed in the area.
The object was first seen in the southwestern horizon on Glengarry St.
